product_summary: Miraa is an AI-powered tool that helps you easily create subtitles and transcripts for your videos. It uses speech recognition and machine translation to automatically generate subtitles in multiple languages. Miraa also offers interactive AI explanations, which allow you to chat with AI and get help with your transcriptions.
product_cons: May not be accurate for all languages or accents
Can be expensive for large volumes of transcription
May require some manual editing to ensure accuracy
Not yet available for all languages
May not be suitable for highly technical or specialized content

product_usecases.details: Miraa can be used to create subtitles for videos in multiple languages. This can be useful for making your videos more accessible to a wider audience, or for translating videos into different languages.
Miraa can be used to transcribe audio recordings into text. This can be useful for creating transcripts of interviews, lectures, or other audio content.

Miraa can be used to help you learn a new language by providing interactive AI explanations of the subtitles. This can help you to understand the meaning of words and phrases, and to improve your pronunciation.
Miraa can be used to create educational materials such as subtitles for videos, transcripts of lectures, or interactive AI explanations. This can help to make learning more accessible and engaging.

Miraa can be used to help with media production tasks such as creating subtitles for videos, transcribing audio recordings, or translating videos into different languages. This can help to save time and money, and to improve the quality of your media productions.

product_pricing: Miraa offers a free plan that allows you to transcribe up to 30 minutes of audio or video per month. Paid plans start at $12 per month and offer additional features such as unlimited transcription time, multiple language support, and custom branding.
